Articles.Content:
I go to the future and sell it.

the next poster gets my time machine.

> 
> the next poster gets my time machine.

The item you give needs to be an amount of currency, sorry.

[GAME RULES](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/112519-Imaginary-Charity!?p=1774237&viewfull=1#post1774237)

sorry

the next poster gets enough gold to buy my time machine.

I buy the machine, then go back in time and steal the gold from myself before I bought the machine. I have gold and a time machine.

The next poster gets $12.

Set the 12$ in a very particular place in my house. I come back a week later, wanting to donate it to the end bad things in the world fund, only to find its not there.

I give the next person 100$... All in pennies
I buy a cake. The next poster gets 42 euros

I use the euros for stocks on Google

The next poster gets these stocks

I'll keep them stocked at Google.

The next posters gets a penny. Don't spend it all in one place, now.

I put it in my change jar. The more the merrier!

The next poster gets $4,000,000.
I buy a quantum computer just for ksp and other junk I spend the rest on my life

> 
> I buy a quantum computer just for ksp and other junk I spend the rest on my life

You do realize that quantum computers are only faster than standard ones when used for specialized parallel computing, right?

Also, thanks for nothing, uncle Scrooge. How very charitable of you ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

The next poster gets ALL the money!

i use it all to fund serveral space missions. then use the rest to fund my life.

the next poster gets $1,000,000,000,000 USD

You gave me a 20. (Futurama Reference)

The next person gets $30. Go crazy.

I take it and spend it on gas........

the next poster get's 34.5637 moneys........yes moneys......no its not a real currency......its powered by IMAGINATION ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I start a Super PAC.

I give 0.001 dollar to next person.

I cry...

I give the next poster 50,000 Yen.

I buy a coffee

i give the next poster 2345-345-345-345-345-345- usd

I get a calculator...

I feel extra generous today so i give the next user a button. (I don't need it because my pants have a zipper)

I add the button to my Super PAC.

I give the next user a campaign button. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

I would sell it to a fan and buy beer.

I give the next user the empty bottle and a cap.

I take the bottle

...and donate the cap to the next user.

not moneys.

I give the next poster all the moneys ever fired beyond the solar system.

I use the moneys ever fired (Probably zero currencies were ever fired interstellar) beyond the solar system to do nothing.

I discover life, NORAD and SETI tell me I can't tell anyone, give me 10,000,000,000,000,000 US$ and I give half to the next user.
